main.name: Abhinav Jangra
main.bio: As a detail-oriented and results-driven professional, I specialize in Cloud DevOps, data analysis, and full-stack development, leveraging a strong technical foundation to deliver innovative solutions. My experience includes deploying scalable applications using Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), Terraform, Docker, and microservices architecture. With a proven track record in building CI/CD pipelines and automating workflows, I am passionate about solving complex challenges and optimizing systems for impactful results in cloud environments.

education.degree: Cloud Development and Operations - Graduate Certificate
Business Intelligence System Infrastructure - Graduate Certificate
Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering

work.title: Senior Analyst
work.description:
● Migrated batch and historical data processing from Teradata and Oracle to Azure Data Lake and Synapse, leveraging PySpark, ADF, and Delta Lake, improving data accuracy and retrieval time by 10%.
● Designed and automated data pipelines and Control-M job scheduling for incremental big data processing in Azure Databricks, reducing manual effort by 5%.
● Developed PySpark frameworks for transformations, optimized data ingestion, and enabled seamless customer notifications via Logic Apps and ADF.
● Automated SQL-to-PySpark transformations and data validation scripts, cutting manual workload by 2 months and improving debugging efficiency by 12%.
● Collaborated with Agile teams to align migration efforts with strategic goals, delivering impactful, scalable solutions.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform on AKS (Best Buy App)
projects.description: Developed and deployed a scalable e-commerce platform on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) using microservices architecture, integrating RabbitMQ, MongoDB, and AI services to streamline order processing and improve user experience.

projects.title: VMware to Azure Migration
projects.description: Executed the migration of a VMware-hosted application to Azure using Azure Migrate, ensuring seamless replication, deployment, and post-migration validation.

projects.title: AI-Assisted Business Intelligence (Capstone Project)
projects.description: Developed a web application leveraging GPT-3 and PostgreSQL to automate data analysis for Canada Post, enabling real-time insights and maintaining operational cost efficiency.

projects.title: Music Player Project
projects.description: Created a feature-rich music player with a sleek front-end interface using React and backend integration with Node.js, focusing on real-time music streaming and playlist management.

projects.title: CST8916 Final Project
projects.description: Designed a comprehensive cloud-native architecture that implements best practices for scalability, resilience, and CI/CD automation in Azure.
